title: Subchapter C - Teacher
content:
Subchapter C - Teacher

State Regulations

Part 80 - Requirements for Teachers' Certificates and Teaching Practice (Subpart 80-1 to 80-6)

Part 81 - Teacher Resource And Computer Training Centers (§ 81.1 to 81.3)

Part 82 - Hearings Of Charges Against Employees On Tenure (Subpart 82-1 to 82-3)

Part 83 - Determination Of Good Moral Character (§ 83.1 to 83.7)

Part 84 - Access To School Employee Personnel Records (§ 84.1 to 84.3)

Part 85 - Mentor Teacher-internship Program (§ 85.1 to 85.2)

Part 86 - Albert Shanker National Board For Professional Teaching Standards Certification Grant Program (§ 86.1 to 86.5)

Part 87 - Criminal History Record Check For Prospective School Employees And Applicants For Certification (§ 87.1 to 87.10)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. Part 80 - Requirements for Teachers' Certificates and Teaching Practice (Subpart 80-1 to 80-6)

Part 81 - Teacher Resource And Computer Training Centers (§ 81.1 to 81.3)

Part 82 - Hearings Of Charges Against Employees On Tenure (Subpart 82-1 to 82-3)

Part 85 - Mentor Teacher-internship Program (§ 85.1 to 85.2)

Part 86 - Albert Shanker National Board For Professional Teaching Standards Certification Grant Program (§ 86.1 to 86.5)

Part 87 - Criminal History Record Check For Prospective School Employees And Applicants For Certification (§ 87.1 to 87.10)
